articles.title: About
articles.description: I am an anthropologist and archaeologist interested in the study of power. I am currently looking at incarceration and immigration. My thinking is informed by such ideas as Foucault's biopower, Agamben's state of exception, and Mbembe's necropolitics. I also like to count things, and sometimes make maps.
articles.contents:
Figure 1: Nathan Craig and Margaret Brown Vega showing Washington Blade reporter Michael Lavers a drawing made by a man in solitary confinement. (Photo by Michael Lavers)



Nathan Craig
College Assistant Professor
Department of Anthropology
New Mexico State University
